channel.title: CVE Feed for Pandora.tv -- KMPlayer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pandora.tv -- KMPlayer

item.title: CVE-2019-9133|2024-08-04T21:38:46.358Z -- pandora.tv -- kmplayer
item.description: When processing subtitles format media file, KMPlayer version 2018.12.24.14 or lower doesn't check object size correctly, which leads to integer underflow then to memory out-of-bound read/write. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to open a malicious file.
